name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程的目標在使學生了解化工製程安全的重要,並分析實際工安事故,調查分析,以及預防措施
schedule:
Unit 1: Lab safety 
Unit 2: Static sparks
Unit 3: High temperature hydrogen attack
Unit 4: Uncontrolled reaction
Unit 5: Runaway reaction
Unit 6: Fire explosion
Unit 7: Dust explosion
Unit 8: Ice and water
Unit 9: Confined space
scorePolicy:
作業
小考
期末考
(暫定)
